extension.name: My Blog Entries
extension.author: StackIdeas
extension.description: Displays a list of blog entries for each particular user. User's can then comment on the blog entries in the listings.

param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Set whether this application is a core JomSocial application or not.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

param.name: expanded
param.label: Content initially expanded
param.description: Collapse or expand the blog content when the page loaded.

param.name: allowcomment
param.label: Allow comment
param.description: Allow site member and site visitor to comment on the blog post.

param.name: allowhits
param.label: Display hits
param.description: Enable or disable hits in the listings.

param.name: allowreadon
param.label: Display readon
param.description: Enable or disable readon in the listings.

param.name: showcontent
param.label: Display contents
param.description: If enabled, the contents of the blog post will be displayed.

param.name: showratings
param.label: Show ratings
param.description: If enabled, the ratings will be displayed.

param.name: limit
param.label: Text Limit
param.description: Limit the length of the blog content.

param.name: count
param.label: Max Count
param.description: The number of max blog entries to display.

param.name: order_by
param.label: Order By
param.description: Blog entries sorting by either creation date or blog title.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Default position if you select this as core apps
